description: Forest carbon stocks estimates from 1990 to 2010. These estimates are outputs of the Carbon Calculation Tool(CCT) which provides a state level annualized estimates of carbon stocks and flux.

name: Forest Carbon Flux Emission Storage  In Colorado  1990 To 2010
